modName: Death Dealer Vampire Race for Underworld
summary: Death Dealers are Vampire warriors that were created to combat Skyrim\'s growing problem of Werewolves and the Undead. For centuries death dealers have been in the shadows fighting for the Vampires.
descriptionHtml:
This brings the Death Dealers from the Underworld Series to Skyrim. 

You can start as a Death Dealer Vampire with all traits to Skyrim lore Vampires. 

Death Dealers are Vampire warriors that were created to combat Skyrim\'s growing problem of Werewolves and the Undead. For centuries death dealers have been in the shadows fighting for the Vampires. 

Abilities are Vampire Muffle(move silently when crouching), Vampire Sight (night eye when crouching), Vampire Strength(unarmed damage 25pts), Vampirism(Resist poison and disease) and Sun Damage level 1 (100% loss of regeneration in Stamina, Magic and Health with 15 pts to each damage per second in sun light)

No other mods are required for this mod to work but it is recommended to use 

For a more immersive vampire experience 

I have tested this race with 
DVA- dynamic vampire appearance 
Better Vampires 
Underworld Dawnguard Blue Vampire Eyes 
Tales of Lycanthropy 
Heart of the Beast 
The Dance of Death 
SkyMoMod which is Skyrim Monster Mod 
Apachii Hair 
Ponu tails by azar 

The armor used in the pictures are Lustmord Vampire Armor by AmethystDeceiver 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25852/? 

Also if you want to have martial arts animations there are two that I have used and knwo to work with this race 
Jump animations by Davjes http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16069/ 

Martial Arts by evanoblivion http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9421//? 


If anyone has any questions jsut leave a message here and i will respond as soon as i can.

Please rate and Enjoy as always
author: KalEltheKryptonian
